articles.title: Pebble's founder introduces a $75 AI smart ring for recording brief notes with a press of a button - TechCrunch
articles.description: Named for the finger where the ring is meant to be worn, the new $75 Index 01 ring is not meant to be a competitor to the always-on, always-listening AI devices, like the AI pendant Friend, but instead offers a way to record quick notes and reminders with a p…
articles.content: After rebooting the Pebble smartwatch brand, founder Eric Migicovsky is expanding his company’s device lineup with a new smart wearable: an AI-powered smart ring known as Index 01. Named for the fing… [+6060 chars]

articles.author: Sean Conlon, Pia Singh
articles.title: Stock futures are little changed as Trump approves Nvidia chips sales to China: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Out of the 11 S&P 500 sectors, the tech sector was the only one that closed in the green on Monday.
articles.content:
Stock futures were little changed Tuesday, despite a bump in Nvidia shares after President Donald Trump approved H200 chip sales to China in a deal that gives the U.S. government a hefty cut.
